wesm commented on pull request #6762: ARROW-8272: [CI][Python] Fix test failure on Python 3.5
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6762#discussion_r400546174
 
 

 ##########
 File path: .github/workflows/python.yml
 ##########
 @@ -74,15 +69,15 @@ jobs:
           docker-compose push ubuntu-python
 
   conda:
+    # this is the nopandas build
     name: AMD64 Conda Python ${{ matrix.python }}
 
 Review comment:
   I think a "nopandas" build needs to be clearly marked as such since it is the exceptional case, not the typical one. I would guess than over 90% of pyarrow installs also have pandas installed.
   
   There are hundreds of skipped tests when pandas is not installed so if someone is looking at one of these nopandas builds that might be misled like I was in the other PR
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

wesm commented on pull request #6762: ARROW-8272: [CI][Python] Fix test failure on Python 3.5
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6762#discussion_r400546774
 
 

 ##########
 File path: .github/workflows/python_cron.yml
 ##########
 @@ -115,19 +154,21 @@ jobs:
       fail-fast: false
       matrix:
         name:
-          - dask
-          - hdfs
-          - turbodbc
+          - dask-latest
+          - hdfs-2.9.2
+          - turbodbc-latest
           - kartothek-latest
           - pandas-master
           - pandas-0.24
         include:
-          - name: dask
+          - name: dask-latest
             library: dask
-            title: Dask
-          - name: turbodbc
+            dask: latest
+            title: Dask latest
+          - name: turbodbc-latest
             library: turbodbc
-            title: Turbodbc
+            turbodbc: lates
 
 Review comment:
   typo: latest

URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6762#issuecomment-607382691
